product_name: Joby Gorillapod SLR-Zoom with Ball Head
long_description: Sporting a ball head, this new Joby Gorillapod SLR-Zoom tripod allows you to easily tilt and rotate your camera. Ball head accommodates full 360deg pans and 90deg tilt and can support an SLR or camcorder up to 6.6 lbs. Ball head is equipped with a standard 0.25 in. adapter and can be used atop other tripods. Includes a quick-release bubble-level clip that can remain attached to your camera for effortless and speedy setup. Unlike traditional tripods, the Gorillapod SLR-Zoom doesn't require an elevated flat surface for you to take the perfect shot. An adaptable screw (from 0.25 to 0.375 in.) lets you mount a digital SLR or a tripod head of your choosing. Flexible joints bend and rotate 360deg to form the perfect shape. Ring and foot grips work on most surfaces, providing extra holding power.
short_description: Sporting a ball head, this new Joby Gorillapod SLR-Zoom tripod allows you to easily tilt and rotate your camera.
